text: Muxuu yahay arrinkiinnu, haddaba, oo aad ugu qaybsanteen labo kooxood xagga munaafiqiinta?35 Isagoo Allaah uu dib ugu celiyey (gaalnimo) waxa ay kasbadeen darteed? Ma waxaad dooneysaan inaad hanuunisaan mid uu Allaah lumiyey? Oo qofkii uu Allaah lumiyo, uma heli doontid marnaba jid (uu ku hanuuno)
